_sText: SURF_ADVERSE by Target Practice - This map is an arena surf. - The purpose of the map is for each team to capture all four bases and hold them. - An excellent arena map for DM servers. [NOTE: round-times are meant to be long] - Telehopping is incorporated into the map. Enter the teleport at speed to gain an advantage. - Try your hand at grabbing the AWP and M249. - If you have the skills then show off some tricks in some excellent spots in the map. _________________________________________________ THIS MAP IS SPONSORED BY www.Surf-Velocity.com Clan Leader: WireleZz _________________________________________________ BASE POINTS ...In order to capture a base you must stand on the point for 5 seconds until all the lights have changed and the sound plays. ...For each base capture your team will recieve one point. ...You can view the scores by pressing your TAB key and viewing the SCORE for each team. ...Once your team has all 4 bases then your team will gain 1 point every 10 seconds until you lose a base. TELEHOPPING ...In order to telehop you must gain speed on the boosts and maintain this speed when entering the teleport. _________________________________________________ - Many thanks go to DragonRock and Mapjunkies. - Special thanks goes to Archangel for all his help, advice, and wisdom. - Further thanks to Ryan S. - Thanks to Icecreamlock for his unleveled bug-spotting abilities. - I appreciate all the beta testers who took part in playing the private tests throughout the making of this map. ________________________________________________ INSTALLATION: - To install the map you will need to copy&paste (or extract the contents of the .rar if you wish) the .BSP file (surf_adverse.bsp) into the 'maps' folder. - To get to this folder you will need to go into: - Program Files>Steam>Steamapps>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps. - The .bsp file included in the download should go in your maps folder. - Load up the game and you should be able to play it. _________________________________________________ If you have any problems or queries about this map then feel free to contact me: - xfire: targetpractice808 - STEAM Friends: Target Practice Enjoy the map. _________________________________________________ TRAILER:
